name: Saptarshi Dutta
title: UI/FullStack Developer
carrierSummary: Experienced software developer working as a Technology Lead with infosys. I work in Digital experiences space and have in-depth knowledge of working with front end technologies in web and native app development. I have good understanding of backend technologies and have working experience in NodeJs and Springs MVC. In my current postion I have worked in teams responsible for delivering large scale enterprise applications.

workExperience.title: Technology lead - Infosys ltd.
workExperience.company: A large manufacturing and engineering company
workExperience.description: The work primarily involved commissioning and maintaining Microsoft Intune; a MDM Solution; on end user devices. In addtion, I was also responsible for 'Mobile Application Management' where I and my team had to work on innovative solutions to deploy and track various enterprisse application. We engaged with various development teams to help then adopt a better DevOps and create mature CI/CD pipelines.

workExperience.title: Technology lead - Infosys ltd.
workExperience.company: One of the world's largest Chemical Company based out of Germany
workExperience.description: My work primarily involved designing and developing windows 8.1 and UWP applications using XAML and C#. The app catered to the agricultural domain and proved to be very helpful in driving up sales by providing a platform for the sales representatives to move out on the field and engage with farmers direclty right on the farmlands. The app boast of a solid offline data persistance layer and SAP Mobile Platform middleware for data refresh and reconsilation. In addtion to the front end app, I also contributed to the backend layer written on Springs MVC with connections to SAP Hana as well as traditional SQL databases. I worked as a full stack developer in the project

workExperience.title: Technology Analyst - Infosys ltd.
workExperience.company: A large Power solutions company based out of France
workExperience.description: I worked on creating interactive iOS solution leverage OpenUI library from Agentry Solutions(Part of SAP Mobile Platforms). I also contributed towards developing the backend logic using J2EE and connecting it with Salesforce. The app catered to feild engineers working with high power electrical machinery.

workExperience.title: Senior Systems Engineer - Infosys ltd
workExperience.company: One of the worlds largest phone and consumer electronic manufacturer based out of California, US
workExperience.description: As a part of the project, I was engaged in developing UI using technologies such as html5, SCSS and CanJS.I also contributed towards creating a fast and stable CI/CD piple line using NodeJS, Gulp. I was also involved in providing quick and meaningful response for any critical production issue and production deployments in general.
